tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE energy_audit_reports (
  company_id INT NOT NULL,
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_date DATE,
  energy_consumption DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE energy_audit_reports (
    report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    company_name VARCHAR(255),
    auditor_name VARCHAR(255),
    audit_date DATE,
    energy_consumption DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE energy_audit_details (
    detail_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    report_id UUID REFERENCES energy_audit_reports (report_id),
    audit_section VARCHAR(255),
    audit_description TEXT,
    findings TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE energy_audit_reports (
    audit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    company_name VARCHAR(255),
    audit_date DATE,
    energy_consumption_kwh DECIMAL(10, 2),
    energy_reduction_goal DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE audit_details (
    detail_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    audit_id INT REFERENCES energy_audit_reports(audit_id),
    auditor_name VARCHAR(255),
    audit_type VARCHAR(50),
    audit_result TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE companies (
    company_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    company_name VARCHAR(255),
    company_size VARCHAR(50),
    industry_type VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE energy_consumption_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    company_id INT REFERENCES companies(company_id),
    energy_usage_kwh DECIMAL(10, 2),
    reporting_month DATE,
    reporting_year INT
)

CREATE TABLE energy_savings (
    savings_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    company_id INT REFERENCES companies(company_id),
    savings_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    implementation_date DATE,
    target_completion_date DATE
)
